means: Sound Navigation and Ranging声呐，声波导航和测距装置

word_mean: 又称 :声呐(sound navigation and ranging )
。利用声波在水下的传播特性，通过电声转换和信息处理，完成水下探测和通讯任务的电子设备。

sentence.Network_en: We picked up two submarines on sonar.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们用声呐系统观察到两条潜水艇.

sentence.Network_en: The sonar reveals acres of cobblestone fields surrounding our craft.
sentence.Network_cn: 声纳揭示出在我们潜水器的周围是一片几英亩大的鹅卵石地.

sentence.Network_en: I'm getting a strong response on the sonar.
sentence.Network_cn: 我在声纳上测得强力反应.

Doppler radar,多普勒雷达Doppler sonar,多普勒声纳dose,剂量
按声纳的工作方式来区分,它通常又分为主动声纳 (Active SONAR) 和被动声纳 ( Passive SONAR )。主动声纳发射信号并接收,被动声纳只有接收功能。  主被动声纳虽然.
sonar signalling 声纳信号装置sonar simulator 声纳模拟器sonar target 声纳反射物标

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1940s: from so(und) na(vigation and) r(anging), on the pattern of radar

encyclopedia.content: SONAR是在电脑上创作声音和音乐的专业工具软件。专为音乐家，作曲家，编曲者，音频和制作工程师，多媒体和游戏开发者以及录音工程师而设计。Sonar的前身是著名的音乐制作软件Cakewalk，该软件至今仍有很多音乐人在使用。

entry.tran: 声呐(一种利用声波测量水深或水下物体位置的船载装置)
entry.def: Sonar is equipment on a ship which can calculate the depth of the sea or the position of an underwater object using sound waves.

means.word_mean: 1. a measuring instrument that sends out an acoustic pulse in water and measures distances in terms of the time for the echo of the pulse to return; sonar is an acronym for sound navigation ranging; asdic is an acronym for anti-submarine detection investig
